newsitem.title: JAPAN: Asics' shares extend losses in early Tokyo.
newsitem.headline: Asics' shares extend losses in early Tokyo.

text.p: Shares in Asics Corp, a large sporting goods company, extended their losses in Tokyo morning trade on Wednesday after revising downward its parent earnings for the year to January 20.

As of 0044 GMT, Asics" shares were down 13 yen at 225 yen, making the company the seventh largest percentage loser on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. The company"s shares ended lower on Tuesday.

Also on Tuesday, the company announced that it had revised down its forecast for a net parent loss of 5.9 billion yen from its initial estimate of 4.5 billion yen for the year to January 20, partly on unexpectedly sluggish sales of ski and soccer goods.
